description: The photo has been released of a man believed to have been part of the "Crazy Brabant Killers".
title: Photo 'vital lead' in hunt for Belgium's supermarket killers
title_page: Photo 'vital lead' in hunt for Belgium's supermarket killers - BBC News
maintext: The group is said to have been comprised of three men who covered themselves in face paint during the raids and became known for their violent and merciless attacks, shooting dead staff, customers and children during the robberies. Some of the victims were tortured before being killed.
